text: Xu Zhengxi (, born 5 May 1985), also known as Jeremy Tsui, Izz Xu, Jones Xu or Jeremy Jones Xu is a Chinese actor. == Career == He first gained attention with his portrayal of male lead Ji Rufeng in 2011 modern romance drama Waking Love Up, and was able to revitalise his career with the antagonist roles Yuwen Hu in the historical drama The Legend of Dugu and Li Wangping in Republican drama Siege in Fog. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable sortable" !
